data.eml:eml: A new species of Plectromerus Haldeman (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) from Navassa Island, Greater Antilles

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nearns, Eugenio H., Steiner, Warren E. (2006): A new species of Plectromerus Haldeman (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) from Navassa Island, Greater Antilles. Zootaxa 1163: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.2645379
